description: Depicts activities in the daily life of farm children in the province of Umbria. Portrays features of their home environment such as their house, garden and food, show children participating in the farm work, particularly in the picking and processing of olives. Illustrates the role of family festivities and musical enjoyment in the lives of Italian children, and features market activities in the Italian city of Assissi.
